recipesJson.name: Banana Frosted Flakes
recipesJson.author: Dennisj66
recipesJson.description: Tastes dead on like a bowl of Banana Creme Frosted Flakes that were around sometime last year after about a weeks steep time. Shouts out to Silky’s Nana’ Flakes for the idea of trying my hand at a banana frosted flake profile!

reviews.text: Love this stuff. I’m not good at letting stuff steep but luckily I made this when I had a scratchy throat and this mix irritated the SHIT out of it... so I put it away for a while. I just recently was dripping stuff Inset aside and came across this mix and fell in love with it. I love the banana cornflake combo. It goes so well together. Good work man!

This is great the meringue and fresh cream create the milk and the nana custard and cereal 27 really work well together 2 week steep for me... To me its more of a raisin bran type flake than a corn flake... in that case if you do like that id say try the new raisin bran banana nut crunch... thanks for the delicous recipe i will stop being a shill now be safe =]
